article_title: Oregon Gov. John Kitzhaber Resigns Amid Ethics Probe
article_text:
Oregon Gov. John Kitzhaber said Friday that he would resign from his post, amid a criminal investigation stemming from alleged ethical breaches involving his fiancée that had been dogging his office for months.

Just weeks after being sworn in for a record fourth term, Mr. Kitzhaber, a 67-year-old Democrat, bowed to mounting pressure to resign amid media reports that his fiancée, first lady Cylvia Hayes, had allegedly been paid to...
